section.summary:
Analyzing Summary Sources

Join the Webinar Classroom, Tuesday 9:00 am - 12:15 pm Pacific Time.

This week we will discuss the value of summary sources. We will examine and appraise several examples of summary research, including acupuncture & IVF, as well as acupuncture and pain. Our stats chat will review risk ratio and continue with a discussion of confidence intervals.

During the webinar, you will complete the In Class Exercise #6: "Summary Research Checklist". Please download the worksheet before class.

Due this week:

  • All responses due in Discussion Forum #2 July 18th before class
  • Moderator team begins to formulate debate questions in Discussion Forum #3 - Debate (Group Collaboration Space)

Due next week:

  • Incorporating EIP into courses and clinic
  • Due July 25th before class - Moderator team finalizes debate questions before class Discussion Forum #3 - Debate (Group Collaboration Space)
